description: Object detection involves identifying and locating objects within images or video streams. This problem is crucial in various applications, including autonomous vehicles, surveillance, and quality control in manufacturing.
you_have_this_if: You need to identify multiple objects in images or videos.
Real-time processing is required for your application.
You are working with complex backgrounds or varying lighting conditions.
High accuracy in detection is critical for your use case.
You have access to specific hardware constraints (e.g., low-powered devices).

approaches.best_for: Detecting defects in fabrics with complex patterns.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Offers high accuracy but may require more computational resources.

approaches.best_for: Real-time object detection in dynamic agricultural environments.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Balances speed and accuracy, suitable for robotic applications.

approaches.best_for: Deploying detection systems on low-powered hardware.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Minimizes latency but may sacrifice some accuracy.

approaches.best_for: Detecting small objects in real-time for autonomous vehicles.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Optimized for small object detection but may be complex to implement.

approaches.best_for: Real-time barcode detection on mobile devices.
approaches.key_tradeoff: High accuracy with minimal resources, but may be limited to specific tasks.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need high accuracy in defect detection for quality control.
You are building a robotic system for agricultural applications.
You need to deploy a detection system on low-powered hardware.
You are working on an autonomous vehicle project requiring small object detection.
You need a lightweight model for real-time barcode detection on mobile devices.

start_here: Start with Improved YOLOv5 for a balance of speed and accuracy in dynamic environments, especially for agricultural applications.
